subject: Re: How rude!
author: Jill
full_text:
I love how their website says, "This is a tool for use by experienced paranormal investigators only."  I think it should be the goal for almost EVERYONE to have a ghost box.  As long as they are brave enough, and not prone to mental problems or extremely sensitive, I think it would be great if everyone could have the experience of knowing -- absolutely knowing without question -- that there is something else out there.  Sure, some negative stuff can happen, but think of the possibilities of what we could learn if everyone had one of these things.  I'd think the positive would far outweigh the negative.  Either way, to say that the box should be in the hands of only a few, seems extremely arrogant to me.
